Sep 4, 2003

Cocktail

The New York times reports that “Africans Outdo Americans in Following AIDS Therapy.” This is a serious issue because failure to take medicines regularly can result in new, more virulent strains of AIDS that are resistant to medication. The statistics show 90% of Africans sticking to their pill regimes compared to 70% of Americans. B...
